name: Cosmic golf
description:
'sup? I made this thing. Its a minigolf type of game made for the 1-Button Jam 2020.

My initial plan was to hand-make  puzzle levels with obstacles and other elements like boost- and jump-pads, teleporters, I dont know, windmills? Minigolf stuff. But, this is basically the first project that ive done in Godot and i have very little coding experience, so figuring it all out in a week was never going to happen. 

The game spawns a semi random amount of a few types of obstacles, some of which are removed when the level is reset. Some remain to make the game harder the longer you play.

Its got some known issues including, but not limited to:

- jank

- ball's initial position is off sometimes

- obstacles can spawn on top the cannon, maybe?

This concludes my presentation, thank you for coming.



Music by Nicolas Jeudy / DARK FANTASY STUDIO, licensed through HumbleBundle.
